ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Sit-in
ygData.msgSnippet: Do you think that Verant would notice 10 people sitting in on each server, or 150 people sitting in on one server?   I m not arguing your point, just askin the
ygData.messageBody:
Do you think that Verant would notice 10 people sitting in on each server, or 150 people sitting in on one server? I'm not arguing your point, just askin the question. I think that you may very well get more notice by doing it all on one server, if in fact you could get a huge turn out. If you did it on all servers you would just spread it out more and get smaller turnouts on all servers instead of a huge showing on one.

On a side note, I think the point is moot... I think the powers that be have determined that that armor is all good and I don't believe they will be changing anything, even if we get 2000 clerics to sit in at freeport.

I suppose you could start refusing heals and ressurections to make your point, but then you only hurt the other players and the GM's really don't give a giant rat's whiskers... so... oh well...
Life goes on, and nobody bothers getting the cleric armor =)

-Eachann Bronzeleaf,
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Shannon Corley <scorley1@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 9:17 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Sit-in


> From: Shannon Corley <scorley1@...>
>
> I suggest we do this on every server.Why not? We need all the servers to
> get together on this one! Same spot on all servers. The more servers we
> do this on the more verant should take notice! Come on guys, I may not
> be a web master but lets all make a diffrence instead of those of you on
> the Fennin Ro server.Hope to see E'ci players there. Remember December
> 3, 1999 6 PM PST (9 PM EST) on all servers in west Freeport.
>
> Kargath
> Proud 15th level Cleric of Tunare
> E'ci Server
>
> > Crowell wrote:
> >
> > I am proud to announce that the Cleric Sit-In will take place on
> > December 3, 1999 at 6PM PST (9PM EST) on Fennin Ro in the city of
> > Freeport. Our purpose is to show Verant that a great number of Clerics
> > and their friends are dissatisfied with the current state of the
> > Cleric-only armor quests that were meant to replace Rubicite. The
> > Cleric-only armor presently has two flaws that we would like to see
> > corrected. One, the quests themselves take a ridiculously long amount
> > of time to complete (days or weeks for just one piece), and two, the
> > armor class (AC) of the Cleric-only armor is not on par with classes
> > of its type (The new Cleric-only armor's AC is actually *lower* than
> > the original Rubicite). To receive more information about these
> > concerns and to find out how you can show your support, please visit
> > http://freepages.ugo.com/clericsrequest. And to those of you who
> > already plan on participating in this event please check the
> > information page, as several updates have been made. I look forward to
> > seeing everyone there, and in all hopes we can get Verant to listen to
> > our suggestions. Thank you all for your support.
> >
> > Sincerely,
> >
> > Norin Grimsbane of The Tribunal
>
>
